overview: Bhaaratheeyam is a 1997 Indian Malayalam-language drama film directed by Suresh Krishnan and written by Madhupal from a story by Krishnan. Starring Suresh Gopi, Kalabhavan Mani, Maniyanpilla Raju, Anusha and Suhasini. The film has songs composed by Berny-Ignatius and background score by Mohan Sithara.
title: Bhaaratheeyam
